name: Better Bing Search
description: Better Bing Search was originally created to just update the search bar to be more similar to the one on the home page, but ended up being expanded into optimizing and modernizing a few more elements around the search page.
additional_info:
Version 1.1 [current]
* Slightly tweaked search box's padding for better aesthetic look.
Version 1.0.1
* Fixed not working on non-HTTPS Bing.
Version 1.0
+ Search bar is modern and animated.
+ Slight outline around user icon when signed in.
+ Updated settings icon in top-right, animated hover.
* Page selection at bottom modernized and animated.
* Most things are now colored with new Bing brand colors.
